nodes.text: The faction of Mandalore the Avenger was a coalition of Mandalorian clans that had survived the Eternal Empire conquest on the galaxy. After Mandalore the Vindicated was killed, the clans rallied behind Shae Vizla's banner and continued to follow her into the Eternal Alliance, providing their skills and talents to the galaxy's benefit as they assisted in it's recovery after the war against Zakuul was over.
